languages.text: Древний свиток с торжественным обетом служения Императору. Записан неизвестным миссионером со слов великой Надин Алейников.
An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.
languages.original_text: Древний свиток с торжественным обетом служения Императору. Записан неизвестным миссионером со слов великой Надин Алейников.

traits.locale_text: An ancient scroll with a solemn vow of service to the Emperor. Penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

languages.text: Un antique parchemin sur lequel est inscrit un vœu solennel de service à l'Empereur, rédigé par un missionnaire inconnu sous la dictée de la grande Nadine Aleynikov.
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

traits.locale_text: Un antique parchemin sur lequel est inscrit un vœu solennel de service à l'Empereur, rédigé par un missionnaire inconnu sous la dictée de la grande Nadine Aleynikov.

languages.text: Un antiguo pergamino que encierra un solemne juramento de servicio al Emperador, redactado por un misionario a partir de las palabras de la gran Nadine Aleynikova.
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

traits.locale_text: Un antiguo pergamino que encierra un solemne juramento de servicio al Emperador, redactado por un misionario a partir de las palabras de la gran Nadine Aleynikova.

languages.text: 皇帝への仕えるという真面目な誓いが記された古代の巻物で、偉大なナディン・アレイニコフの言葉をどこぞの聖務団員が書き記したもの。
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝への仕えるという真面目な誓いが記された古代の巻物で、偉大なナディン・アレイニコフの言葉をどこぞの聖務団員が書き記したもの。

languages.text: 这个古老的卷轴上写着效忠帝皇的庄严誓词，是某位不知名的传教士根据伟大的纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫的原话写成的。
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

traits.locale_text: 这个古老的卷轴上写着效忠帝皇的庄严誓词，是某位不知名的传教士根据伟大的纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫的原话写成的。

languages.text: Eine alte Schriftrolle mit einem feierlichen Dienstschwur für den Imperator, niedergeschrieben von einem unbekannten Missionar nach den Worten der großen Nadine Aleynikov.
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

traits.locale_text: Eine alte Schriftrolle mit einem feierlichen Dienstschwur für den Imperator, niedergeschrieben von einem unbekannten Missionar nach den Worten der großen Nadine Aleynikov.

languages.text: İmparator'a hizmet hakkında dinî yeminler içeren kadim bir tomar. Bilinmeyen bir misyoner tarafından kaleme alınmış ve haşmetli Nadine Aleynikov'un sözlerini aktarıyor.
languages.original_text: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.
